content:
Your skepticism is understandable as it is important to be critical of charitable organizations to ensure that they are effectively accomplishing their mission. 

One way to measure the effectiveness of charities is to look at their track record of accomplishment as well as their financial transparency. Comic Relief has been able to raise significant amounts of money over the years, which have funded many projects around the world. Its impact report and evaluation information are available on its website allowing anyone to review details of its projects and be aware of how funds have been used.

It's also recommended to pay attention to the charity's rating on watchdog and charity evaluation sites such as Guidestar, Charity Navigator, and Great Nonprofits. These sites evaluate charities based on their transparency, financial stability, and accountability, providing objective information about its operations.

Additionally, it is essential to research the specific programs and project undertaken by a charity and understand how it aligns with the mission of the organization. This helps to evaluate the consistency of the operations of the charity (projects, goals, mission), ensuring that the reality matches their claims of social good.

While knowing the exact impact of charitable organizations is challenging, evaluating the transparency, consistency, and actions of a charity can help donors to better understand the effectiveness of a charity in achieving its mission.
